#include <iostream>
#include<bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
    //out << "Hello world!" << endl;
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--){
    char c[26], b[26];
    cin>>c>>b;
    int a1[26]={0},b1[26]={0};

    for(int i=0;i<strlen(c);i++)
        a1[c[i]-'a']++;

        for(int i=0;i<strlen(b);i++)
        b1[b[i]-'a']++;

        int flag=1;
        for(int i=0;i<26;i++)
        {
            if(a1[i]!=b1[i])
               {
                   flag=0;
                   break;
               }
        }
        if(flag==0)
            cout<<"NO"<<endl;
        else
            cout<<"YES"<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
